parsed.explanation: The original XML string contained several issues: (1) The XML was not wrapped in a root element, so I added the <file> tag from the outer JSON object. (2) Several Unicode escape sequences were corrected to their proper characters (e.g., '\u221a\u00fc' became 'ü'). (3) Inconsistent tag names ('PRIZE' vs. 'PRICE') were standardized to 'PRICE'. (4) The ampersand (&) was properly escaped as '&'. (5) Removed unnecessary '\u221a\u2020' characters, which seemed to be OCR errors or other artifacts. (6) Added missing tags were not necessary as the existing structure was mostly kept, but corrections were made within the existing tags.
